title: Laughing Fish's 175,000 lifetime upvote spectacular (Come and get your free skins!)
body:
#CLOSED: THANKS FOR PLAYING

There were a total of 369 upvotes, so 4 mystery skins were unlocked. I used a random number generator to select the winners from a list of the 202 eligible candidates. The winners are:

* a w1ld Bulbasaur
* Athyarra
* Embertine 
* DragonManSquid 

Friend requests have been sent to the winners, and the gift will be sent 24-48 hours after the friend request is accepted. I would also like to thank deoje299, who helped a lot of people correctly post their gifs. As such, I will also be sending him a gift as well. If the friend request is not accepted within 1 week, the prize is forfeit. Thanks for playing everyone!



http://i.imgur.com/XIOSiVd.png

It is good to be King.

http://i.imgur.com/ur8vSIm.jpg

---------------------------

Since I began my campaign for complete domination of the boards, many things have changed. Some posters have disappeared, never to be seen again. Some slowly lost interest and just faded away. Some stood against me, believed themselves to be my rival. And a few have stood the test of time and raged against the dying of the light. But none of this has deterred me. This is my domain, and you are my beloved people. So, to show you all my appreciation, I have decided to throw this joyous event, and give away some free skins!

https://68.media.tumblr.com/cfd039730669f89c064f69e57e0877af/tumblr_nj6ipiNACJ1t8s6eeo1_500.gif

#How to play:
All you need to do is post a gif of an upvote! Oh, and say my name. I not joking. If you do not say my name you will **not** win a prize.

https://m.popkey.co/b83c5e/lMEpZ.gif

At the start there will only be one mystery skin given away. But for every 100 upvotes this post gets, I will give away another mystery skin! (up to 7 skins, unlocked at 600 upvotes. I will be using FEK to check the total number of upvotes, so downvotes have no effect on this. 

1 upvote = 1 skin (Unlocked)
100 upvotes = 2 skins (Unlocked)
200 upvotes = 3 skins (Unlocked)
300 upvotes = 4 skins (Unlocked)
400 upvotes = 5 skins (Not reached yet)
500 upvotes = 6 skins (Not reached yet)
600 upvotes = 7 skins (Not reached yet)

-------------------------

One entry per person, open to NA only (sorry EU folks). Ends Sunday, June 4 at 3pm EST. I will use a random number generator to pick between all eligible entries. I will send a friend request to winners, and gifts will be sent 24-48 hours after the friend request is accepted. If the winner doesn't accept the friend request within one week, their prize is forfeit. As I intent to share the winning gifs, I reserve the right to disqualify any participant whom I feel has posted an inappropriate gif.

------------------------------

> # **How to post a gif**
>* step 1: Final the desired gif
> * step 2: right click the gif and click "copy image address" (wording varies by browser)
> * Step 2 alternate: if the URL does not copy correctly, open the image in its own tab and copy URL from there.
> * Step 3: post URL into the comment. 
> * Step 4: Watch this video for motivation.
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXsQAXx_ao0
>
>**NOTE: If you have a giphy gif, you need to need to obtain the image URL, and post it into your browser. You then need to right click it, and click "copy image address". Post this URL onto the boards, and delete the .webp and replace it with .gif**

replies.body:
Look here you meme king wannabe!
Anybody can post a meme, that doesn't make yours worth looking at.
Unfortunately, I have to inform you that your memes are no good.
Get a real job and make your own instead of stealing them from others!
Half of your memes were used by someone else 20 minutes prior.
If I don't see a hot, fresh meme from you next time it's Banville buddy!
Nobody wants those dirty reposts.
Giving you our attention would be a mistake.

Frankly, if I had my way images wouldn't be allowed on the boards.
I am tired of these low-effort attempts at a joke.
So I'm officially putting my foot down here.
Have your little game, scoundrel, the men will giggle no more.

http://cdn.funnyisms.com/cbaa7f8d-4749-480a-8e57-b25a59765e0c.gif
you forgot to say his name......

You clever bastard.
